attributes.action: Is an alleged attack on a few Syria's really enough to start ww3??
attributes.additional_details: From the BBC footage, doctors are washing down victims with water, without protective clothing on themselves???
attributes.background: Without 100% proof a chemical attack in Syria, should we really be ready to send in the bombs? We should be sure what happened? Where? When? And by who? Before sending in anything that could end in WW3
